Contact Info

  • 6391 Elgin St. Celina, Delaware
  • (+001) 123-456-789
  • info@example.com
  • Week Days: 08.00 to 10.00

China's Premier Provider of Touch Screen Cover Glass,Specializing in R&D, Manufacturing, and Complete Solutions.

Leading the industry with innovative technology, precision engineering, and comprehensive integrated solutions for global partners.

Development HistoryOUR JOURNEY & MILESTONES

2024

● Mass production of China's first deep double-strengthened glass 'Panda-F.Loong'.

2022

● New float process high-aluminum cover glass production line put into operation.

● Owning two float process high-aluminum cover glass production lines.

● Leading domestic provider of protective cover glass solutions.

2021

● Groundbreaking of the new float process high-aluminum cover glass production line.

2020

● Controlled by state-owned capital including Kefa Group and Jingkai Investment Holding Group.

2019

● Mass production of double-strengthened glass achieved.

● Successfully entered Xiaomi's supplier pool as the sole domestic provider.

2017-2018

● Became the sole domestic glass supplier for vivo.

● Won the Second Prize of National Science and Technology Progress Award.

● Awarded as the Individual Champion Demonstration Enterprise.

2015-2016

● Market share expansion with applications in LG, Huawei, Xiaomi, and Lenovo.

● 'King Panda' brand gradually gained market recognition.

2014

● Registered 'King Panda' trademark.

● Shifted to production of 'King Panda' high-aluminum cover glass (single-strengthened).

● Performance reached advanced industry standards.

2013

● PDP glass officially rolled off the line.

● Achieved mass supply to Changhong.

2010-2012

● Company established.

● China's first R&D and production of PDP, breaking international technology monopoly.

Sichuan Hongke Innovation Technology Co., Ltd. is mainly engaged in the research, development, manufacturing and sales of protective glass for smart terminal displays, special glass for aerospace and new optical materials. It is the first high-tech enterprise in China to simultaneously realize the industrialization of high-alumina cover glass and lithium aluminum silicon cover glass.
